frontmatter.title: Design Systems 101
frontmatter.subTitle: Get your team familiar with design systems and try its basic processes

meta.desc: During this workshop participants will get a hands-on experience with basic design processes while creating and maintaining their own design system. You'll learn how following these processes helps with establishing a well documented universal design language which reflects a shared understanding of the brand and translates into the design-system implementation in code and design tools.
